summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Risk Management Dashboard. Backend APIs are fully functional with 11/11 tests passing. Frontend UI is mostly working with configuration persistence, status display, and logs functionality operational. Found one UI bug with trailing profit step input visibility.

ui_bugs.issue: Trailing profit step input field not properly shown/hidden when toggle is switched
ui_bugs.details: The conditional rendering of the trailing profit step input is not working correctly. When trailing profit toggle is enabled, the step input should be visible, but it's not appearing consistently.

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (11/11 tests passed)
Dashboard loading and initial data display
Metric cards display (P&L, Trades, Consecutive Losses, Position Size)
Side lock dropdown (None, BUY Only, SELL Only options)
Tab navigation between Configuration and Logs
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix trailing profit step input conditional rendering in Dashboard.js. The input field should be visible when trailing_profit_enabled is true and hidden when false.
